category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: scheduling_graph_reference_calendar
preference.preference_description: Specifies the calendar type to use for domain (x = days) and range (y = availability/work allocation) axes in the resource graph. Valid Values: resource_calendar_type - Specifies the domain for the resource calendar. system_calendar_type - Specifies the domain for the system calendar.
